body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I am not a paying user of Docker Hub, and therefore occasionally get throttled when pulling down images. When pulling down images either locally or in production from the `temporalio` or `temporaliotest` Docker Hub user, I receive throttling errors when I hit my rate limit.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
The Amazon ECR Public Gallery has high public quotas: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonECR/latest/public/public-service-quotas.html. There are many organizations that put their docker images in the Amazon ECR Public Gallery:

- HashiCorp: https://gallery.ecr.aws/hashicorp/
- Elastic: https://gallery.ecr.aws/elastic/
- Ubuntu: https://gallery.ecr.aws/ubuntu/

This would allow more users who are unwilling to buy into the paid Docker ecosystem use Temporal.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
- Pay for Docker
- Copy Temporal's public images from Docker Hub into a private registry

**Additional context**
N/A
title: Temporal Docker Images in the Amazon ECR Public Gallery
